content.title: Capillary Malformation
content.description: Cutaneous vascular malformation affecting capillary vessels (port-wine stain)

key_concepts.details: Pink to red-purple flat lesion present at birth; darkens and thickens with age
Facial V1 distribution: screen for Sturge-Weber syndrome
Persist lifelong; gradual thickening, nodularity, and darkening
Pulsed dye laser (595nm) most effective; multiple treatments required

content.clinical_significance: Most common vascular malformation; V1 facial distribution warrants investigation

primary_sources: Enjolras O et al. Pediatr Dermatol 2007
